Conversation gets better with time, so spend more time with great friends.

10 hours. 10 days. 10 weeks.

1105091352495300609.text:
The purpose of books is not for them to remain pristine and untouched.

It's to maximize the value you extract from them.

You need to learn:
> How to read properly
> How to take notes (use the margins)
> How to remember what you read
> A system for applying what you learned

brands once forced customers to see everything, for as long as possible (ie. walk the entire grocer for milk). 

now, brands need their audience to see the most relevant thing, for as short as possible (ie. hyper-targeted experiences for instant data capture).

so, data > milk
